meanings.definition: An excessive awareness or sensitivity to one's surroundings.
meanings.sent1: Her hyperawareness of every sound made it difficult for her to relax.
meanings.sent2: His hyperawareness of his surroundings helped him notice the small details others missed.
meanings.sent3: The cat's hyperawareness of the mouse's movements led to a comical game of chase.
meanings.sent4: The hyperawareness of the detective allowed him to solve the case quickly.
meanings.sent5: The hyperawareness of the chef for quality ingredients made his dishes stand out.

meanings.definition: The state of being acutely conscious or alert to stimuli.
meanings.sent1: The soldier's hyperawareness of danger saved his comrades in battle.
meanings.sent2: The athlete's hyperawareness of the opponent's movements gave him an advantage in the game.
meanings.sent3: The hyperawareness of the students during the surprise test made the teacher smile.
meanings.sent4: The hyperawareness of the pilot prevented a potential disaster during the storm.
meanings.sent5: The hyperawareness of the artist to colors and shapes inspired her unique creations.
